definition: variant of 克[ke4]/to subdue/to overthrow/to restrain
Ke (c. 2000 BC), seventh of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
abbr. for 克羅地亞|克罗地亚[Ke4 luo2 di4 ya4], Croatia/(Tw) abbr. for 克羅埃西亞|克罗埃西亚[Ke4 luo2 ai1 xi1 ya4], Croatia
surname Long/short for 吉隆坡[Ji2 long2 po1], Kuala Lumpur

sentences.english: It was originally designed for the pilot Clone Wars micro-series.
sentences.chinese: 它原本是为《克隆人战争》微系列剧的飞行员设计的。

sentences.english: Antinori's determination to clone threatens his current livelihood.
sentences.chinese: 安蒂诺里坚持克隆人的决心已危及到他目前的生计。

sentences.english: The loyal clone troopers executed their treasonous Jedi generals in cold blood.
sentences.chinese: 忠诚的克隆人士兵冷酷地处决了叛国的绝地将军们。

sentences.english: Indeed, you may know several and even have dated a clone.
sentences.chinese: 其实可能认识好几个，甚至与克隆人有过约会。

sentences.english: Before the Clone Wars, the Commerce Guild firmly held these population centers.
sentences.chinese: 克隆人战争前，商业行会牢牢控制着这些人口中心。

sentences.english: So how real is an economic threat is human cloning?
sentences.chinese: 那么克隆人是否真地带来了经济威胁？

sentences.english: To clone gene of the TRAIL and construct its prokaryotic expression vector.
sentences.chinese: 目的克隆人TRAIL基因，构建其原核表达载体。

sentences.english: Most of the clones were sleeping.
sentences.chinese: 绝大多数克隆人正在安睡。

sentences.english: What do scientists think about the ethics of human cloning?
sentences.chinese: 关于克隆人的论理学问题科学家们是如何考虑的？

sentences.english: The Legion was split into special mission groups, often to supplement other clone missions.
sentences.chinese: 兵团被划分为若干别动队，经常增援其他克隆人部队。

sentences.english: The Galactic Empire inherited the technological achievements of both warring factions of the Clone Wars.
sentences.chinese: 银河帝国兼并了克隆人战争交战双方的技术成果。

sentences.english: That is, until humanity kneels before my army of cyborg clones.
sentences.chinese: 直到人类军队跪倒在我的电子机械克隆人大军面前。

sentences.english: Huge stretches of cityscape were transformed into military staging areas, and clone troopers were everywhere.
sentences.chinese: 大片城区被改造成军事集结地，克隆人部队无处不在。

sentences.english: A clone combat engineer of the 38th Armored Division.
sentences.chinese: 第38装甲师的一名克隆人战斗工兵。

sentences.english: This is Vos' first appearance in The Clone Wars.
sentences.chinese: 这是沃斯第一次出现在《克隆人战争》里。

sentences.english: Stormtrooper officers were traditionally non-clone graduates from the Imperial Academy.
sentences.chinese: 冲锋队军官通常是帝国军校的毕业生，非克隆人。

definition: Star Trek (US TV and film series)
